trans-unit.source: Defines constants that specify whether single or multiple item selections are supported by a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> control.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A> properties together determine how users can select items in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.

For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A> is Single and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionUnit>, the user can select one cell at a time in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionUnit.Cell>.
InExtended mode, select multiple items by holding down the SHIFT key to extend the selection from an anchor point or the CTRL key to individually select additional items.
Multiple items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> can be selected at the same time.
Only one item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> can be selected at a time.
